sections.heading: Definitions. (1)For the purpose of fiscal affairs of the state, appropriations acts, legislative budgets, and approved budgets, each of the following terms has the meaning indicated:(a)“Activity” means a unit of work that has identifiable starting and ending points, consumes resources, and produces outputs
